topic.shortdesc: IntroductionThe purpose of the Drugs Patient Level Contract Monitoring Data SetÂ (DrPLCM) is to enable the interchange, in a uniform format, of monthly PATIENT level drug Contract Monitoring data between all purchasers and Health Care Providers.
